pda.view

Class PhotoBoostView

  • java.lang.Object
    • pda.view.PhotoBoostView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class PhotoBoostView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The PhotoBoostView is the first page of the Photoboost's interface
    This page displays the parameters menus and the access to the galleries.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Florent Catiau-Tristant and Mehdi Haddad
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • creerInterface

        private void creerInterface()
        Create the interface of the home page.
        It contains :
        • The name of the application : PhotoBoost
        • 3 buttons, to access to the parameters and the galleries
